name: Creamy Shrimp Pasta
comments: This dish is intentionally very liquid. You can stretch the dish by using a whole pound of pasta, but the flavor will be much less intense.
ingredients: 1-2 tsp. minced garlic, or garlic powder to taste
1/2 lb. angel hair pasta, cooked and drained
instructions: Melt butter in large skillet. Add shrimp, all seasonings and lemon juice and cook until shrimp are pink and opaque. Stir in cream cheese and tomatoes and let simmer a few minutes to blend. Serve over pasta and top with parmesan.
